mapper.update:
update staff
account = #{account,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
password = #{password,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
status = #{status,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
did = #{did,jdbcType=INTEGER},
name = #{name,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
sex = #{sex,jdbcType=CHAR},
id_number = #{idNumber,jdbcType=CHAR},
work_time = #{workTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
leave_time = #{leaveTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
born_date = #{bornDate,jdbcType=DATE},
info = #{info,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
where id = #{id,jdbcType=INTEGER}

update staff set account = #{account,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, password = #{password,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, status = #{status,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, did = #{did,jdbcType=INTEGER}, name = #{name,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, sex = #{sex,jdbcType=CHAR}, id_number = #{idNumber,jdbcType=CHAR}, work_time = #{workTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, leave_time = #{leaveTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, born_date = #{bornDate,jdbcType=DATE}, info = #{info,jdbcType=VARCHAR} where id = #{id,jdbcType=INTEGER}
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO sm.staff(account, password, status, did, name, sex, id_number, work_time, leave_time, born_date, info) values(#{account},#{password},#{status},#{did},#{name},#{sex},#{idNumber},#{workTime},#{leaveTime},#{bornDate},#{info})
